q.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
q.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

q.quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
q.author: Bob Marley

q.quote: Dinner was made for eating, not for talking.
q.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

q.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
q.author: Frederick Douglass

q.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
q.author: Salvador Dali

q.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
q.author: Henry Rollins

q.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
q.author: David Joseph Schwartz

q.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
q.author: Neil Armstrong

q.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
q.author: Winston Churchill

q.quote: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
q.author: Carol Burnett

q.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
q.author: Ronald Reagan

q.quote: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
q.author: Ronald Reagan

q.quote: The way to become rich is to put all your eggs in one basket and then watch that basket.
q.author: Andrew Carnegie

q.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
q.author: Ronald Reagan

q.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
q.author: Sigmund Freud
